lines.text: Their first mistake was thinking that the child was asleep, the second mistake was that the wife had decided to come home that night on the train.

[shakes Lucy's bracelets]
Where did you get those?
I saved them, I remember the way they used to jangle when you picked me up to kiss me goodnight.
I hate you! I hate you! I hate you! No I didn't mean that, I love you. I hate you!
Lucy Harbin took an axe, gave her husband forty whacks, when she saw what she had done, she gave his girlfriend forty one.

[Lucy storms out to find two girls playing jump rope]
What is it, Mother?
London bridge is falling down, falling down, London bridge is falling down, my fair lady.
It's just a nursery rhyme, mother.
Take the key and lock her up, lock her up, lock her up, take the key and lock her up, my fair lady.

[to Michael]
You sit down here with Carrol because I wouldn't want her to think I was taking her father away from her.
Leave me alone! Leave me alone! I'm not guilty! I'm not guilty!
